      Create an absolutely stunning table decoration with these crystal clear plastic decorative Candle Holders. Glossy plastic finish coupled with slim sleek stem and fascinating cylinder shape will impart a regal charm to your tabletops. Exceptionally clear plastic construction will showcase your beautiful craft creations elegantly, providing a bedazzling spectacle for your guests to behold. The Candle Holder is wide enough to hold natural or artificial candles, corsages, or carnations in the most magical manner.

      For a perfectly exotic look, place these Candle Holders atop our decorative mirrors and scatter votive candles, LEDs and silk rose petals around. Celebrate your merry moments with heavenly radiance and ecstatic glee by decorating with our spectacular crystal clear tall decorative cups. You can use these voguish cups as swish centerpieces to decorate your party ambiance, or can fill these with tasteful treats, party favors and candies with a tulle circle and ribbon bow adornment to simply WOW your guests and invitees

entry.title: 31" Tall Tapered Cylinder Glass Candle Holder - Clear Floor Candle Holder Centerpiece
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4810
Type: Centerpieces
Price: 78.99

[About]

1 Qty: 1 Glass Candle Holder
Material: Glass
Color: Clear
Style: Cylinder
Height: 31"
Body Width: 8"
Depth: 31"
Base Diameter: 4"
Opening Diameter: 4"
Glass Thickness: 0.20"
Premium Quality: Made from high quality, handcrafted, crystal clear glass
Unique Design: Suitable for all styles: Modern, Contemporary, Eclectic or Vintage
Perfect for floral and centerpiece displays
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

 

Premium Quality Candle Holder

Crystal clear transparency of premium quality glass is highlighted by the artistic shapes and highly detailed finishing of our Glass Candle Holders. Boasting contemporary styles of modern art and high grade glass construction, these eclectic decorative centerpiece Candle Holders are perfect for making stunning centerpieces and unique floral, candle, or succulent display.

Multi-Purpose & Versatile

Multi-purpose and versatile, these gorgeous decorative floor Candle Holders look totally tantalizing on their own, but also make an excellent accent for modern homes and minimalist decor. Bring a modish twist to your kitchen cabinets by storing pasta and rice or dried pulses and spices. Layer with colorful sand, glitter or Candle Holder fillers to create one of a kind centerpiece. Besides making awe-inspiring accent pieces, these clear glass cylinder Candle Holders can also be given as thoughtful and practical gifts for anniversary, wedding, birthdays, and house warming presents.

Create One Of A Kind Arrangements

This ribbed design glass jar is full of character and makes a fantastic Candle Holder, centerpiece or can be used as a novel way to display treasures with moss or a mini still life. Create one of a kind flower arrangement by combining fresh seasonal flowers and picks, or opt for our long lasting life-like artificial flowers and greenery. Display refreshing colors of nature by making pretty succulent and cacti accented arrangement,  fill with water and light submersible LEDs and candles for an exotic display of shine and sparkle.

 

Additional Information:

  • Can put water, sand, and vase fillers
  • A great container for Wedding Reception or Garden Style Wedding Decor.
  • Makes a perfect and memorable gift!
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all Candle Holders should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

entry.title: 3 Pack - Egg Shaped Glass Wall Candle Holder
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4500
Type: Centerpieces
Price: 12.99

[About]

QTY: 3 Glass Wall Candle Holders with 4 Hooks
Material: High Quality Glass
Color: Clear
Shape: Egg
Height: 5"
Width: 4"
Flat Base Diameter: 2.5" | 1.5"
Opening Diameter: 2"
Hook Opening Diameter: 0.43"
Overall Hook Size: 1.5" L x 0.75" W
Thickness: 0.1 cm
Display Option: Hole in back for hanging or can be placed on any flat surface
Each Candle Holder comes with a hook for easy hanging
All sizes are approximate measurements

[Information]

 

High Quality Glass

Combining crystal clear transparency of high quality glass with classic round shape, this versatile wall mounted Candle Holders will bring a tasteful twist to your home and office space. Whimsical spherical shaped indoor wall Candle Holders are perfect to add style and sense of urbanity to your interior; use these wall hanging terrarium to display plants and candles to bring a fresh feel and natural beauty to your home or workplace.

Multipurpose and Versatile

Multipurpose and completely versatile, with a small hole in the back, these indoor wall Candle Holders can be attached to the walls and boards using appropriate mounting hardware or can be hung with a rope or string to create a lovely floating garden effect. Make unique candle arrangements and table centerpieces by incorporating these wall hanging Candle Holders with flowers, succulents, candles, Candle Holder fillers, and lights.

Highly Decorative

These wall hanging Candle Holder are perfect for housing water plants, air plants, candles, and a good choice for using as decoration props on weddings, parties, coffee shops, and home gardens. Add simplicity and modern style to your ambiance with our range of unique shaped Candle Holders. Besides being absolutely gorgeous in look and impact, these glass wall Candle Holders are completely purposeful. For your friends and family members who love planting, this trio is an ideal choice, or can also be given as a unique house warming gift!

Additional Information:

  • Package Included:
    • 3 Glass Wall Candle Holder
    • 4 nail hooks
  • Capacity: 2 lbs Max
  • Feature: Heat Resistance Glass
  • The small hole in the back allows you to attach this Candle Holder to the wall.
  • Can be filled with water, pebbles, sand, acrylic, and vase fillers
  • Uses: Decoration props on Wedding, Party, Coffee shop
  • Note: No plants or decorations included in these items!
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all Candle Holders should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Change liquid contents of glass containers frequently. This will help preserve the products finish and avoid film build-up
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

Exquisite Spray Painted Glass Candle Holder

An exquisite amalgamation of sparkling urbanity and minimalist aesthetics! Our gorgeous Gold Spray Painted Glass Candle Holder are perfect to add pizzazz and glamour to your dull spaces. Featuring crystal clear glass construction in a classic rectangle shape and matte gold spray painted base, these gold dipped cylinder glass Candle Holder make an ideal decorative accessory to elegantly glam up your wedding or party tables, coffee tables, and living room shelves, and even your kitchen counters.

Excellent Accent

These dazzling rectangle candle holder look totally tantalizing on their own, but also make an excellent accent for modern homes and minimalist decor. Bring a contemporary twist to your kitchen cabinets by storing pasta and rice or dried pulses and spices.

Create One of A Kind Centerpiece

Fill with seasonal or faux flowers to make stunning flower arrangements, layer with colorful sand, glitter or candle holder to create one of a kind centerpiece. Besides making awe-inspiring accent pieces, these votive candle holders can also be given as thoughtful and practical gifts for anniversary, wedding, birthdays, and as house warming presents.

 

Additional Information:

  • Perfect to use for flower arrangements or even to use as candle holder
  • Uses: Home Decor, Weddings, Churches, Restaurants, and Events
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all candle holder should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.

  • Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures

[Information]

Made from heavy duty and high quality see-through glass, our stylish range of decorative Candle Holders makes an ideal adornment and eye-catching decorative accents for any party or home décor. Our hand blown cylinder Candle Holders with their thick walls and weighted base will give a modern twist to any floral or centerpiece decoration. These glass centerpiece Candle Holders will instantly add flair and visual appeal to any ordinary party or table setting. This size is perfect for tall pillar candles; fill with jelly filler balls or acrylic ice crystals of your theme color and top with a submersible LED or a floating candle to create exotic decorative accent. For an even more luxurious look and feel, swathe our satin or organza ribbons around with a cute bow or a flower to make an ethereal party favor or a votive candle holder.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Premium Glass
  • Color: Clear
  • Qty: 6 pcs per order
  • Height: 12"
  • Width: 5"
  • Glass Thickness: 4mm
  • Heavy Duty Glass
  • Inclusion: Top choice for candle shops & wedding planner.

    **NOTE** This item not suitable for Int'l Shipping, to our international customers, please order at your own risk.**NOTE**

    How to Care:
    • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
    • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
    • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all Candle Holders should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
    • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

      [Information]

      Chic square shape augmented by glitzy Silver glitter accent gives these plates a really cherry on the top affect. Crafted with intricate artistry in modish square shape and further beautifully accented with glittery Silver dust accents throughout, these plates make a glamorous and lavish alternative to simply paper or Styrofoam disposable plates. No need to break the banks now to attain that classy feel and regal radiance your special events deserve.

      Crafted from clear plastic and beautifully accentuated with sparking Silver dust and glittering Silver rims, these dashing plates will add imperial shimmer and surreal sophistication to your banquet tables. The heavy duty food grade plastic will withstand your hot and cold servings while glimmering glittered design will make them appear more tempting and delightful. For a truly extravagant look and appeal, pair these plates with our Silver Dust Sprinkled Plastic Bowls, Cups, Spoons, Forks, and Knives, and place atop white cotton linen for a crisp contrast, or create a glamorous coherent ambiance by complementing these posh plates with our Silver tone table runners, table linens, tablecloths, table napkins and napkin rings. Mimicking the sleek finish of fine china, these plastic plates will combine the quality of affordability with the convenience of disposability

       

      Additional Information:

      • WARNING: Not Microwave or Dishwasher Safe
      • Perfect for wedding receptions, banquets, and upscale catered events
